programme.title: Kin
programme.desc: Arissa appears and drops a bombshell that is targeted at destroying Jessica but things take an unexpected turn. Eunice is concerned with Matthew's angst behaviour and insists he goes for a health check.

programme.title: Talking Point
programme.desc: (Encore) Ever felt the dreaded post-lunch slump? A full stomach can make us too sleepy to resume work. How is our lunch affecting our productivity? And what should we eat so that we stay alert?

programme.title: Ninja Warrior
programme.desc: A Japanese sports entertainment television series in which 100 competitors attempt to complete an obstacle course.

programme.title: Food Chase
programme.desc: Pierre Png, Shabir, Charlie Goh, and Sora Ma are in Joo Chiat for Food Chase. With overconfidence rearing its ugly head and cries of foul play, which team from This Land Is Mine will emerge the winner?

programme.title: Deal Or No Deal USA S5
programme.desc: One of America's most popular and beloved game shows, "Deal or No Deal", is back with it iconic host Howie Mandel.

programme.title: P.I.
programme.desc: With the case of the missing girls getting complicated, The Honest Agency seeks help from the police and offers up whatever information they have. Christine gets harassed by a mysterious man who claims that she still owes him something after he had paid her.

programme.title: Luke Nguyen's Vietnam
programme.desc: Luke stops off in Dong Hoi and prepares a dish for a family on route to Vinh. After another three hours' drive, Luke explores the vibrant market lifestyle in this small country town, where locals, all too keen to lend a hand with his recipes of chargrilled eel and pork neck, overrun him. He also visits a family living on a rickety stilt house in the middle of the lake, where he prepares a pickled bamboo and tamarind soup for some keen kids ready to pass j.

programme.title: Martha Bakes S11
programme.desc: Martha Stewart is back with an incredible 11th series of Martha Bakes, packed with mouthwatering pies, impressive cakes and the most delicious cookies. Martha is passionate about using the best ingredients possible, and in this series, we'll join her for a lesson with the experts who grow and produce the key ingredients that every baker needs to take their food from ordinary to extraordinary.

programme.title: Weird, True & Freaky
programme.desc: Weird, True & Freaky reveals the worlds most unbelievable and scariest animal encounters ever. Prepare to witness natures most terrifying confrontations gone horribly wrong. Bizarre, alien-like beasts prove that in the animal kingdom, anything is possible. From creatures of the deep entering our lives, to deformed animals fighting to overcome any obstacle, the extraordinary beings keep coming.

programme.title: Animal Rescue
programme.desc: The excreted fireball explodes and its big flames cover the rainforest again. Brainy fox Rody fights off the megabeast with his clever tactics. The moment Rody thinks they have won, the BM robots appear and help the megabeast. Will the Animal Rescue be able to rescue the megabeast from the fiery rainforest?

programme.title: Animal Rescue
programme.desc: Jelly-pet is back! Jelly-pet is able to revive with White's high-tech skills. However, Jelly-pet is not the same as before. It is upgraded to fight against the megabeast. Right as Rody tests the power of the new Jelly-pet, the rescue signal is on.

programme.title: Nature Cat S2
programme.desc: Join Fred the Nature Cat and his animal friends for more mini adventures in the great outdoors, once his human family leaves for the day!

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S3

programme.title: Top Wing S2
programme.desc: Four young birds - Penny, Rod, Swift, and Brody - become new Top Wing cadets to earn their wings by helping their community.

programme.title: Counting With Paula S5
programme.desc: Imagine being the odd one out because you look different. That's how Uncle Sphinx felt without a nose. The children set out to make him a nose so he'll fit in, but things didn't turn out the way Uncle Sphinx had hoped for. The children go in search of the Golden Jasmine Flower on Treasure Island. But Captain Redbeard really wants to get his hands on it first! Will he succeed?

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S23
programme.desc: In this brand new version of the beloved series, Thomas travels full steam ahead across five continents, discovering magnificent new sights and experiencing exciting places and cultures.

programme.title: Pikwik Pack
programme.desc: JJ Giraffe and Tila have lost their ball inside a neighbor's house where loud hollers scare them away. Sir Tibor the Knight and the Pikwik Pack to the rescue! It's the Tooty Fruity Feast! Squick and Squack are busy getting ready, but they can't manage on their own. Neither can the Pikwik Pack, who discover together that asking for help can get them to their delivery on time.

programme.title: Paw Patrol S7
programme.desc: Led by a boy named Ryder, a team of six playful rescue dogs use their individual talents to protect the seaside town of Adventure Bay. The pups are occasionally joined by newer helpers: Cap'n Turbot, Robo-Dog, Everest, and Tracker.

programme.title: Ollie And Friends S7
programme.desc: Ollie, Cherry and Sloppy spy a figure on the moon. Worried that it's stranded and determined to help, they fly up to the moon, only to find a giant alien beast. Their attempts to help enrage it instead, and now the gang has an angry beast on their tail! They say if you send a lantern up into the sky, your wish will be granted. Sloppy has a lot of wishes, so he makes a giant lantern. Unfortunately, his lantern carries more than just his wishes up into the sky --- their entire house with it too!

programme.title: Tall Tales

programme.desc: Luke's journey continues to the mysterious and serene Ninh Binh. Snail catching, duck calling and dog meat are all on the agenda in this beautiful country town. Luke explores the dancing caves, a large tourist spot for locals and international people alike. Luke cooks Mr Dung's favourite meal - pork neck and pineapple - and climbs 1,000 steps to prepare goat meat salad atop the tallest and most breathtaking mountain in Tam Coc.

programme.title: Animal Rescue

programme.desc: An accident causes Mr Space Robot to turn from being neat and tidy, to messy and destructive. The children have to find and fix Mr Space Robot before he destroys more things. programme.title: Ollie And Friends S8
programme.desc: The Imp has joined Ollie, Cherry and Sloppy to form a super team, but poor Mousie is feeling left out! When all of the round objects in Ollipolis are mysteriously transformed into pentagonal blocks, go cart wheels won't spin, and soccer balls won't bounce. Meanwhile, Mousie keeps mentioning a strange sound that no one else can hear.

programme.title: The Enchantimals: Tales From Everwilde
programme.desc: Join the Enchantimals on their exciting adventures, where they head to Frozenwood in search of an ice cream that never melts and visit Grazy Grasslands, to help Merrit Monkey and Cherish Cheetah Enchantimals find the cure for hiccupitis!

programme.title: Regal Academy - Second Series
programme.desc: The Snow Queen has decided it's time to use strength against the Six Great Fairy Tale Families: she decides to free Fala, Hawk's sister she had kidnapped years before, and use her as pawn inside Regal Academy. Helped by his friends, Hawk will face the hardest trial: stop her sister before it's too late...

programme.title: Pokemon Journeys: The Series S23
programme.desc: As Ash and Goh become accustomed to their new roles as research fellows for Professor Cerise, they find themselves surrounded by Pokemon mystery and wonder!

programme.title: Agents of Sprawl
programme.desc: Norman the cyborg and his mysterious "mother" are the only ones who know that the popular new game, Sprawl, is being used to control people's minds. While on the hunt for special players who can help to fight back, Norman meets Zayd... who's lying to his wushu teammates about how special his Sprawl avatar is!

programme.title: The Haunted House: Secret Of The Ghost Ball
programme.desc: There is something not quite right about Shinbi Apartment. Ever since siblings Hari and Doori moved in, they could tell right away that everything seemed a little off. Is it the look? Is it the feel? Is it the smell? Maybe it is the ghosts!

programme.title: Beyblade Burst S1
programme.desc: Valt is learning the importance of controlling his emotions during matches, although he hasn't mastered it yet... After a twist of fate, Valt accepts a challenge against Wakiya at his mansion. Honcho, Daigo and the others race there to help, ready to back Valt up.

programme.title: Open Homes S2
programme.desc: We start with an Award winning kitchen, 3 levels, underground basement and a rumpus room packed with everything. At the Climax we see an incredible heritage renovation that shows the pay off to a challenging build.

programme.title: Food Notes
programme.desc: Dumplings and buns can be found everywhere in China, but why are gourmands so hung up about the piping-hot soup dumplings found in Shanghai? Just how many varieties are there? And what is the best way to eat soup dumplings? Find out more about the allure of this collagen-rich dish on Food Notes.

programme.title: Lion Mums S3
programme.desc: As Winston spends more time with Spencer, he finally realises the value of his friendship and his new educational landscape. There are awkward moments between lovebirds Beng Hian and Chae Lian who might try to take the next step... Another fight ensues as Durrani has a huge quarrel with Nabilah, and she grows suspicious - something is not right with her daughter...

programme.title: Lion Mums S3
programme.desc: The clock ticks and the might of the Lion Mums and Dads comes roaring to the fore as they rush to save Nabilah from the claws of a predator. Nabilah's experience causes a shift in the ways the mothers reconsider their priorities for their children. As Durrani and Reza work together for Nabilah's recovery, they receive help from an unlikely source. At the same time, a reunion of sorts bring out hidden secrets for Chae Lian and Beng Hian.

programme.desc: (PG)(重) 对立乔一直默默暗恋的唐雨晨，仍然不离不弃的守在立乔身边，她不忍心看着自己欣赏的立乔一阙不振，决心帮助立乔走出伤痛，重拾信心和欢笑。传之是96度C的常客，在雨晨眼里，他是个不事生产，沉迷上网的现代草莓一族，拥有严重的"王子病"，喝咖啡却没钱买单。为了还债，他只好接受雨晨的安排，留在96度Café 打工。传之来自富裕问题家庭，因为母亲意外卧病，父亲刘浩仁不甘寂寞与公司职员Ann发展了一段婚外畸恋, 传之为此与浩仁父子冲突离家出走。在96度C, 传之与雨晨相处的过程，发现自己爱上雨晨。他深知立乔封闭的心开始接受雨晨的感情，决定默默隐藏起感情，成全守候着雨晨。.

programme.desc: (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩) 英惠想起信慕的好，决定不离婚，而是毕婚。爱莉为了得到太阳，计划上演苦肉计。她派人开车撞太阳，然后让自己去救他，但却在最后一刻因为害怕而不敢上前。凯文看到太阳有危险，上前将太阳推开，自己受重伤。.

programme.title: 做飯的男人
programme.desc: (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩) 凯文性命垂危，华英觉得凯文是真心对待太阳的，终于将凯文和太阳之间的关系告诉太阳，并要太阳喊凯文一声“爸爸"。太阳大吃一惊。.

programme.title: 捉迷藏
programme.desc: (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩) 彩琳发现海兰长期在服用的镇定剂是水晶帮她准备的。随后，彩琳发现那不是普通的镇定剂，而是长期服用就会引起神经错乱及神经麻痹的药物。.

programme.title: 捉迷藏
programme.desc: (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩) 恩赫陪彩琳去见水晶时被被水晶的手下捉走。水晶要彩琳回到载尚的身边并把太平洋化妆品拿到手，否则就对恩赫不利。.

programme.title: 乘风破浪的姐姐 S1
programme.desc: 节目邀请30位年龄在30岁以上的已出道的女艺人，通过封闭式训练和比赛，最终由全民投票选出7名女艺人组成全新女团。.

programme.title: 婉通夫人
programme.desc: (PG-些许暴力画面)(双声道-中/泰) 婉通之事感动众人。囚犯们欲越狱送婉通去刑场。护送婉通去刑场途中，阿畅带人制造混乱，欲把婉通带走却遭阿贵阻止。.

programme.title: 婉通夫人
programme.desc: (PG-部分画面令人不安)(大结局)(双声道-中/泰) 国王终于赦免婉通。婉通是否能够逃过死刑？此后，国家律法给予女性和男性一样的机会，为自己发声。.

programme.title: 晚间新闻
programme.desc: U频道《晚间新闻》，在半小时里除深入报道本地与国际要闻，还有详尽的财经新闻和体坛动态。世界局势与经济动脉，让大家轻松掌握。.

programme.title: 再创世纪
programme.desc: (PG)(重) 松荫劝明晞与天生离婚，认为天生不值得她牺牲。眼看形势不利，天生将主席之位让予明晞，同时增设四名新董事。明晞处处受董事掣肘，对松荫之言更认同。.

programme.title: 再创世纪

programme.title: 食在有价值
programme.desc: (重) 主持人到东南亚各地查看国际大事如环境污染及定价丑闻对食物价格的影响，让聪明的消费者对盘中物的价格有更深的了解。.

programme.title: 暖心厨房
programme.desc: (重) 谢韵仪练习了一周的斋菜料理功夫就要派上用场，她会找哪位艺人朋友助她一臂之力，完成为乐龄人士们烹煮和递送午餐的终极任务呢？她和这位“厨艺了得而且热心公益”的超级助理会在时间很紧张的厨房里擦出什么火花？.

programme.title: 爱到最后
programme.desc: (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩) 世娜去见耕史，本来想勾引他，后来想到以前也因为勾引度英而害他丧命，才没有那样做。耕史看着哭泣的世娜，假装被感动，重新决定跟世娜合作。.

programme.title: 楼下女友请签收
programme.desc: (PG)(重)《楼下女友请签收》剧情讲述了为了赚钱维持家乡黄梅剧团的龙套演员温小暖被雇用扮演安宁文化CEO叶非墨的暗恋者之后，二人“假戏真做”成为真实爱侣的故事。.

programme.title: 左撇子妻子
programme.desc: (PG-部分画面令人不安)(双声道-中/韩) 南俊派人对付重基。重基连忙逃命，并在秀浩救援下保住一命。秀浩想带重基回朴家，但是重基不肯。两人车上起争执，导致车祸。.

programme.title: 左撇子妻子
programme.desc: (PG-部分画面令人不安)(双声道-中/韩) 珊荷来到朴家，揭发秀浩的真实身分。但朴会长一家人都无法相信她的说法。.

programme.title: 离地自由行 –南非
programme.desc: (PG)(首播) 袁学谦(Benedict)进行28日的东非之旅，由坦桑尼亚出发，寻找电影《铁达尼号》中的坦桑石「海洋之心」；以Glamping方式，近距离与万兽之王共处一室；以开篷四驱车、热气球、步行探险多种玩法，穿梭野生动物保护区；当然少不了以航拍角度，离地俯瞰壮观的非洲大地。他一路向南，走进彩虹之国南非，前往被喻为世界最危险城市之一的约翰内斯堡，探索非洲白人的奢华，以及奴隶主义之后，非洲黑人的压抑生活；并在南非行政首都Pretoria，以全世界其中一种最贵的火车游方式，直奔度假胜地开普敦，欣赏世界自.

programme.title: 翻新援助行动
programme.desc: 43 岁的 马宝凤手忙脚乱，照顾着三个患有多动症的孩子和年迈的父母。她的父亲患有痴呆症，她的母亲患有关节炎。 翻新援助行动能否给这个家庭一个崭新、安全的家园，重新开始？.

programme.title: 爱的救援
programme.desc: (PG)(双声道-中/韩) DREAMS队的安迪选手被日本队看中，胜守经过考虑后要放安迪走，自己再重新选择一个合适的外援。世英与胜守在机场遇到了VIKINGS队的团长钟武，他试探胜守要去哪个国家找球员，却被胜守巧妙的避开了。.

programme.title: 进击的台湾 S4
programme.desc: (重) 介绍台湾当地的美食与它们成功背后的故事。.

programme.title: 十大新加坡
programme.desc: (重) 本地诈骗事件频频发生，是新加坡人太单纯，容易上当？还是骗子手段高深莫测，叫人防不胜防？据报导，新加坡人单在2017年就被骗走至少九千九百多万新元！究竟最常让新加坡人上当的骗术有哪些？.

programme.title: 爱到最后
programme.desc: (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩) 正韩在一间乡下的房子找到了已经瘫痪的崔德培。泰洙向白哲承认崔德培在他手上。白哲担心泰洙会把崔德培交给正韩或警方，答应安静地等待泰洙的指令。.

programme.title: 楼下女友请签收
programme.desc: (PG)(重)《楼下女友请签收》剧情讲述了为了赚钱维持家乡黄梅剧团的龙套演员温小暖被雇用扮演安宁文化CEO叶非墨的暗恋者之后，二人“假戏真做”成为真实爱侣的故事。.

programme.title: 左撇子妻子
programme.desc: (PG-部分画面令人不安)(双声道-中/韩) 艾丝特拿了爱罗的珍珠项链去变卖，被警方逮捕。朴会长气得要逼艾丝特离婚、放弃孩子监护权，而且也将她赶出朴家。.

programme.title: 左撇子妻子

programme.desc: (双声道-中/韩) 本节目为您找出在不同领域有杰出表现的达人。他们可能不起眼、也容易被我们忽略，但他们拥有的技能绝对是无人能及的。.

programme.title: 爱的救援
programme.desc: (PG)(双声道-中/韩) 世英与在喜谈到协调员罗伯特吉身份时，在喜很惊讶他们的协调员罗伯特吉就是韩国非常著名的吉昌洙选手。胜守一直在游说罗伯特吉返回韩国复出，但罗伯特吉却因为自己的过去而犹豫。.
